title: LTO Moonbase Website
description: Full-stack marketing and onboarding website for a blockchain leasing startup. Built from scratch with React and Node.js, deployed via Nginx with SSL for scalability and security.

title: Game Catalog
description: Polished video games directory app built with Next.js and TypeScript. Features dynamic filtering, search, trailer previews, and skeleton loading for optimized UX.

title: Algorithm Showcase
description: Curated collection of coding interview problems with detailed solutions and Big-O complexity analysis. Built for technical exploration and educational practice.

title: YouTube Subscription Organizer
description: Personalized YouTube subscription manager built with Vite, React, and TypeScript. Lets users categorize subscriptions after Google OAuth login for easier, mood-based browsing.

title: Multiplayer Chess
description: Real-time multiplayer chess platform powered by WebSocket communication. Allows quick room creation and play without accounts, built with React and Node.js.
